scripts.build: closure-compiler --assume_function_wrapper --charset UTF-8 --compilation_level ADVANCED --dependency_mode PRUNE --entry_point ./src/luirt.js --js ./src --js_output_file ./dist/lui.js --jscomp_warning boundedGenerics --language_in ECMASCRIPT_NEXT --language_out ECMASCRIPT6_STRICT --module_resolution WEBPACK --rewrite_polyfills false --strict_mode_input --use_types_for_optimization --warning_level VERBOSE
scripts.build-demo: closure-compiler --assume_function_wrapper --charset UTF-8 --compilation_level ADVANCED --dependency_mode PRUNE --entry_point ./test/app.js --js ./test --js ./src --js_output_file ./dist/app.js --jscomp_warning boundedGenerics --language_in ECMASCRIPT_NEXT --language_out ECMASCRIPT6_STRICT --module_resolution WEBPACK --rewrite_polyfills false --strict_mode_input --use_types_for_optimization --warning_level VERBOSE
